mapper.insert: INSERT INTO consumer (consumer_id_pk, consumer_password, consumer_name, consumer_email, consumer_jumin_no, consumer_address, consumer_phone, consumer_sign_up_date, consumer_status, consumer_admit_check_flag) VALUES(#{consumer_id_pk}, #{consumer_password}, #{consumer_name}, #{consumer_email}, #{consumer_jumin_no}, #{consumer_address}, #{consumer_phone}, now(), '정상', 'TRUE');
